CPO.documentation: General info about the database entry. CPO.

field.name: dataprovider
field.documentation: Name of the main data provider (the person who filled the original data)

field.name: description
field.documentation: Pulse/Entry description

field.name: firstputdate
field.documentation: Date of the original data submission

field.name: lastupdate
field.documentation: Date of the last data addition in the tree

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: dataversion
field.documentation: Version of the data structure

field.name: workflow
field.documentation: Workflow which has been used to produce the present entry. Exact format to be defined with the platform group. User-specific input files (if allowed) must be stored there as well.

field.name: entry
field.documentation: Definition of this database entry

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data. Value should be ITM if stored in the official common ITM tree

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: parent_entry
field.documentation: Definition of the entry of the direct parent (if any)

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data. Value should be ITM if stored in the official common ITM tree

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: mdinfo
field.documentation: Information related to machine description for this entry

field.name: shot_min
field.documentation: Minimum shot number to which the machine description applies

field.name: shot_max
field.documentation: Maximum shot number to which the machine description applies

field.name: md_entry
field.documentation: Entry of the machine description used. NB : just for information : for the moment, no guarantee that machine description data have not been modified with respect to the data in md_entry. Machine description data are written explicitely in each CPO.

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data. Value should be ITM if stored in the official common ITM tree

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

CPO.documentation: Atomic physics data CPO. Each occurrence contains the atomic data for a given element (nuclear charge)

field.name: datainfo
field.documentation: Generic information on a data item

field.name: dataprovider
field.documentation: Name of the actual data provider (the person who filled the data)

field.name: putdate
field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.name: whatref
field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: occurrence
field.documentation: Occurrence number of the CPO in the reference entry

field.name: putinfo
field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.name: putaccess
field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: putlocation
field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.name: rights
field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: version
field.documentation: Version of the data.

field.name: source
field.documentation: Source of the data.

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge [units of elementary charge];

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Mass of atom [amu]

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Ion charge [units of elementary charge]. If negative value, means it is a bundle of charge state which cannot be described as single value. Vector of integers (nchargestates)

field.name: state_label
field.documentation: Label for charge state (e.g. D0, D1+, ...); Vector(nchargestates)

field.name: bundled
field.documentation: Flag indicating bundling status. Integer flag: 0=no bundling.

field.name: proc_label
field.documentation: Label for process (e.g. EI, RC; could also include error estimates); Vector(nprocs)

field.name: tables
field.documentation: Rate tables for processes. Vector(nprocs)

field.name: ndim
field.documentation: Table dimensionality of the process. Indicates which of the tables is filled.

field.name: coord_index
field.documentation: Index in tables_coord, specifying what coordinate specification to use for this table.

field.name: result_label
field.documentation: Description of the process result (rate, cross section, sputtering yield, ...)

field.name: result_unit
field.documentation: Unit of the process result

field.name: result_trans
field.documentation: Transformation of the process result. Integer flag: 0=no transformation; 1=10^; 2=exp()

field.name: table
field.documentation: Array of data tables, one entry per species. Vector(nchargestates)

field.name: tables_coord
field.documentation: Array of possible coordinate systems for tables. Vector(ncoordbases)

field.name: coords
field.documentation: Vector(ndim) of coordinates. ndim is number of parameters for a process.

field.name: coord
field.documentation: Coordinate values. Vector(npoints).

field.name: coord_label
field.documentation: String description of discrete coordinate values (if interp_type=0). Vector(npoints). E.g., for spectroscopic lines, the spectroscopic description of the transition.

field.name: extrap_type
field.documentation: Extrapolation strategy when leaving the domain. Vector(2). Entry 1: behaviour at lower bound, entry 2: behaviour at upper bound.; Possible values: 0=none, report error; 1=boundary value; 2=linear extrapolation;

field.name: interp_type
field.documentation: Interpolation strategy in this coordinate direction. Integer flag: 0=discrete (no interpolation); 1=linear; ...

field.name: label
field.documentation: Description of coordinate (e.g. "Electron temperature")

field.name: unit
field.documentation: Units of coordinate (e.g. [eV])

field.name: transform
field.documentation: Coordinate transformation applied to coordinate values stored in coord. Integer flag: 0=none; 1=log10; 2=ln

field.name: spacing
field.documentation: Flag for specific coordinate spacing (for optimization purposes). Integer flag: 0=undefined; 1=uniform; ...

field.name: antenna_unit
field.documentation: Vector of antennas. Each antenna should include information about one (and only one) of the three possible types; EC, LH and IC. Time-dependent. Array of structures(nantenna)

field.name: antenna_ec
field.documentation: Electron Cyclotron antenna

field.name: name
field.documentation: Antenna name

field.name: frequency
field.documentation: Frequency [Hz]

field.name: power
field.documentation: Power [W]; Time-dependent

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: mode
field.documentation: Incoming wave mode (+ or -1 for O/X mode); Time-dependent

field.name: position
field.documentation: Reference global position of the last mirror; Time-dependent

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: launchangles
field.documentation: Launching angles of the beam

field.name: alpha
field.documentation: Poloidal launching angle between the horizontal plane and the poloidal component of the nominal beam centerline (trigonometric convention) [rad]; Time-dependent

field.name: beta
field.documentation: Toroidal launching angle between the horizontal plane and the poloidal component of the nominal beam centerline (trigonometric convention) [rad]; Time-dependent

field.name: beam
field.documentation: Beam characteristics

field.name: spot
field.documentation: Spot characteristics

field.name: waist
field.documentation: Waist for the spot ellipse [m], Vector (2). Time-dependent

field.name: angle
field.documentation: Rotation angle for the spot ellipse [rd], Float. Time-dependent

field.name: phaseellipse
field.documentation: Phase ellipse characteristics of the spot

field.name: invcurvrad
field.documentation: Inverse curvature radii for the phase ellipse [m-1], Vector (2). Time-dependent

field.name: angle
field.documentation: Rotation angle for the phase ellipse [rd], Float. Time-dependent

field.documentation: Ion Cyclotron antenna

field.name: name
field.documentation: Antenna name; String

field.name: frequency
field.documentation: Frequency [Hz]; Time-dependent; Exp0d

field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.documentation: Detailed description of IC antennas

field.name: straps
field.documentation: Properties of the IC antenna strap; Time-dependent; Vector(nstraps)

field.name: phase
field.documentation: Phase of strap current [rad]; Time-dependent; exp0D

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: phi_centre
field.documentation: Toroidal angle at the centre of the strap [rad]; Float

field.name: width
field.documentation: Width of strap in the toroidal direction [m]; Float

field.name: dist2wall
field.documentation: Distance to conducting wall or other conducter behind the antenna straps [m]; Float

field.name: coord_strap
field.documentation: Coordinates (R,z) of polygon describing the antenna in the poloidal plane; rz1d vector (ncoord_strap)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: antenna_lh
field.documentation: Lower Hybrid antenna

field.name: name
field.documentation: Antenna name, String

field.name: frequency
field.documentation: Frequency [Hz]

field.name: power
field.documentation: Power [W]; Exp0d. Time-dependent

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: n_par
field.documentation: Main parallel refractive index of the launched spectrum, for multi-junction antennas. Time-dependent

field.name: position
field.documentation: Reference global antenna position. Time-dependent

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: setup
field.documentation: Detailed description of LH antennas.

field.name: modules
field.documentation: Modules description. NB there are nmodules per antenna, distributed among nma_phi toroidal positions and nma_theta poloidal positions

field.name: nma_theta
field.documentation: Number of modules per antenna in the poloidal direction.

field.name: nma_phi
field.documentation: Number of modules per antenna in the toroidal direction.

field.name: ima_theta
field.documentation: Position index of the module in the poloidal direction (from low theta to high theta, i.e. from bottom to top if the antenna is on LFS). Vector of integers (nmodules).

field.name: ima_phi
field.documentation: Position index of the module in the toroidal direction (from low phi to high phi, counter-clockwise when seen from above). Vector of integers (nmodules).

field.name: sm_theta
field.documentation: Spacing between poloidally neighboring modules [m]

field.name: amplitude
field.documentation: Amplitude of the TE10 mode injected in the module [W], Vector exp1d (nmodules). Time-dependent

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: phase
field.documentation: Phase of the TE10 mode injected in the module [radians], Vector exp1d (nmodules). Time-dependent

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: waveguides
field.documentation: Waveguides description

field.name: nwm_theta
field.documentation: Number of waveguides per module in the poloidal direction.

field.name: nwm_phi
field.documentation: Number of waveguides per module in the toroidal direction.

field.name: mask
field.documentation: Mask of passive and active waveguides for an internal module; Vector of integers (nwm_phi)

field.name: npwbm_phi
field.documentation: Number of passive waveguide between modules in the toroidal direction

field.name: npwe_phi
field.documentation: Number of passive waveguides on each antenna edge in the toroidal direction

field.name: sw_theta
field.documentation: Spacing between poloidally neighboring waveguides [m]

field.name: hw_theta
field.documentation: Height of waveguides in the poloidal direction [m]

field.name: bwa
field.documentation: Width of active waveguides [m]; Float

field.name: biwp
field.documentation: Width of internal passive waveguides [m]; Float

field.name: bewp
field.documentation: Width of edge passive waveguides [m]; Float

field.name: e_phi
field.documentation: Thickness between waveguides in the toroidal direction [m], Vector (nthick_phi). Reminder : nthick_phi = nmp_phi*nwm_phi + (nmp_phi - 1)*npwbm_phi + 2*npwe_phi

field.name: scl
field.documentation: Short circuit length for passive waveguides [m], Vector (nshort_phi). Reminder : nshort _phi = nmp_phi* npwm_phi + (nmp_phi - 1)*npwbm_phi + 2*npwe_phi

field.name: plasmaedge
field.documentation: Plasma edge characteristics in front of the antenna.

field.name: npoints
field.documentation: Number of points in the distance grid. Integer

field.name: distance
field.documentation: Grid for electron density, defined as the perpendicular distance to the antenna waveguide plane (the origin being described in the position sub-structure) [m]. Vector (npoints). Time-dependent.

field.name: density
field.documentation: Electron density in front of the antenna [m^-3]. Vector (npoints). Time-dependent.

field.name: beam
field.documentation: Beam characteristics

field.name: spot
field.documentation: Spot characteristics

field.name: waist
field.documentation: Waist for the spot ellipse [m], Vector (2). Time-dependent

field.name: angle
field.documentation: Rotation angle for the spot ellipse [rd], Float. Time-dependent

field.name: phaseellipse
field.documentation: Phase ellipse characteristics of the spot

field.name: invcurvrad
field.documentation: Inverse curvature radii for the phase ellipse [m-1], Vector (2). Time-dependent

field.name: angle
field.documentation: Rotation angle for the phase ellipse [rd], Float. Time-dependent

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar

CPO.documentation: Generic instant change of the radial core profiles due to pellet, MHD, ... Time-dependent CPO.

field.name: datainfo
field.documentation: Generic information on a data item

field.name: dataprovider
field.documentation: Name of the actual data provider (the person who filled the data)

field.name: putdate
field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.name: whatref
field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: occurrence
field.documentation: Occurrence number of the CPO in the reference entry

field.name: putinfo
field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.name: putaccess
field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: putlocation
field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.name: rights
field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: composition
field.documentation: Plasma composition (description of ion species).

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass number (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: imp_flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in impurity CPO; Vector (nion)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate (not normalised, equivalent to rho_tor_norm) [m]; Vector (nrho). Time-dependent.

field.name: rho_tor_norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal flux coordinate values (= rho_tor normalised to the value at the last grid point); Vector (nrho)

field.name: delta_psi
field.documentation: Instant change of the poloidal flux [Wb]. Time-dependent. Vector(nrho).

field.name: delta_te
field.documentation: Instant change of the electron temperature [eV]. Time-dependent. Vector(nrho).

field.name: delta_ti
field.documentation: Instant change of the ion temperature [eV]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion).

field.name: delta_tz
field.documentation: Instant change of the impurity (multiple charge states) temperature [eV]. Time-dependent. Array3d (nrho,nimp,max_nzimp).

field.name: delta_ne
field.documentation: Instant change of the electron density [m^-3]. Time-dependent. Vector(nrho).

field.name: delta_ni
field.documentation: Instant change of the ion density [m^-3]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion).

field.name: delta_nz
field.documentation: Instant change of the impurity (multiple charge states) density [m^-3]. Time-dependent. Array3d (nrho,nimp,max_nzimp).

field.name: delta_vtor
field.documentation: Instant change of the toroidal toroidal velocity [m.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion).

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate (not normalised, equivalent to rho_tor_norm) [m]; Vector (nrho). Time-dependent.

field.name: rho_tor_norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal flux coordinate values (= rho_tor normalised to the value at the last grid point); Vector (nrho)

field.name: composition
field.documentation: Description of neutrals species

field.name: atomlist
field.documentation: List of the atoms that enter the composition of the neutral species

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass number; Vector (natm)

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge; Vector (natm)

field.name: neutrallist
field.documentation: Definition of neutral species

field.name: ncomp
field.documentation: For each neutral species, number of distinct atoms that enter the composition of this species (1 if the neutral is an atom, more for a molecule : 2 for CH4). Vector of integers (nneut)

field.name: tatm
field.documentation: For each neutral species, and each of its atomic component, index of the atom (referring to the atomlist). Matrix of integers (nneut,max_ncomp)

field.name: multatm
field.documentation: For each neutral species, and each of its atomic component, number of such atoms. Matrix of integers (nneut,max_ncomp)

field.name: typelist
field.documentation: Definition of types for each neutral species

field.name: ntype
field.documentation: For each neutral species, number of possible types considered (in terms of energy : cold, thermal, fast, NBI, ...). Vector of integers (nneut)

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of neutral, in terms of energy : 0=cold, 1=thermal, 2= fast, 3=NBI. Matrix of integers (nneut,max_ntype)

field.name: profiles
field.documentation: Profiles derived from the fields solved in the transport equations, or from experiment.

field.name: n0
field.documentation: Neutral density [m^-3]. Time-dependent;

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Array3D(nrho,nneut,max_ntype). Time-dependent

field.name: flux
field.documentation: Net neutral flux through the magnetic surface, positive values correspond to the direction from the center to the edge [s^-1]. Array3D(nrho,nneut,max_ntype). Time-dependent;

field.name: boundary
field.documentation: Boundary condition for the transport equation. Time-dependent.

field.name: value
field.documentation: Value of the boundary condition. Unit depends on type, respectively [1-field, 2-field.m^-1, 3-m, 4-field.s^-1]. For type 1 to 4, only the first position in the vector is used. For type 5, all three positions are used, meaning respectively a1, a2, a3. Time-dependent. Array3D(3,nneut,max_ntype)

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of the boundary condition for the transport solver. 0- equation not solved; 1- value of the field y; 2-radial derivative of the field (-dy/drho_tor); 3-scale length of the field y/(-dy/drho_tor); 4- flux; 5- generic boundary condition y expressed as a1y'+a2y=a3. Time-dependent. Matrix(nneut,max_ntype)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Position of the boundary condition (in terms of toroidal flux coordinate) for the transport solver [m]. Outside this boundary, the value of the data are considered to be prescribed. Time-dependent. Matrix(nneut,max_ntype).

field.name: t0
field.documentation: Neutral temperature [eV]. Time-dependent;

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Array3D(nrho,nneut,max_ntype). Time-dependent

field.name: flux
field.documentation: Net flux of the kinetic energy through the magnetic surface (3/2*E*n*V), positive values correspond to the direction from the center to the edge [W]. Array3D(nrho,nneut,max_ntype). Time-dependent;

field.name: boundary
field.documentation: Boundary condition for the transport equation. Time-dependent.

field.name: value
field.documentation: Value of the boundary condition. Unit depends on type, respectively [1-field, 2-field.m^-1, 3-m, 4-field.s^-1]. For type 1 to 4, only the first position in the vector is used. For type 5, all three positions are used, meaning respectively a1, a2, a3. Time-dependent. Array3D(3,nneut,max_ntype)

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of the boundary condition for the transport solver. 0- equation not solved; 1- value of the field y; 2-radial derivative of the field (-dy/drho_tor); 3-scale length of the field y/(-dy/drho_tor); 4- flux; 5- generic boundary condition y expressed as a1y'+a2y=a3. Time-dependent. Matrix(nneut,max_ntype)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Position of the boundary condition (in terms of toroidal flux coordinate) for the transport solver [m]. Outside this boundary, the value of the data are considered to be prescribed. Time-dependent. Matrix(nneut,max_ntype).

field.name: v0
field.documentation: Neutral velocity

field.name: toroidal
field.documentation: Neutral velocity in the toroidal direction [m.s^-1]. Positive is anti-clockwise when viewed from above. Time-dependent;

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Array3D(nrho,nneut,max_ntype)Time-dependent;

field.name: boundary
field.documentation: Boundary condition for the transport equation. Time-dependent.

field.name: value
field.documentation: Value of the boundary condition. Unit depends on type, respectively [1-field, 2-field.m^-1, 3-m, 4-field.s^-1]. For type 1 to 4, only the first position in the vector is used. For type 5, all three positions are used, meaning respectively a1, a2, a3. Time-dependent. Array3D(3,nneut,max_ntype)

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of the boundary condition for the transport solver. 0- equation not solved; 1- value of the field y; 2-radial derivative of the field (-dy/drho_tor); 3-scale length of the field y/(-dy/drho_tor); 4- flux; 5- generic boundary condition y expressed as a1y'+a2y=a3. Time-dependent. Matrix(nneut,max_ntype)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Position of the boundary condition (in terms of toroidal flux coordinate) for the transport solver [m]. Outside this boundary, the value of the data are considered to be prescribed. Time-dependent. Matrix(nneut,max_ntype).

field.name: poloidal
field.documentation: Velocity of neutrals in the poloidal direction. 0 is directed towards low field side, pi is towards high field side. Positive is anti-clockwise when viewed with low field side at the right. [m.s^-1]. Array3D(nrho,nneut,max_ntype). Time-dependent;

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Array3D(nrho,nneut,max_ntype)Time-dependent;

field.name: boundary
field.documentation: Boundary condition for the transport equation. Time-dependent.

field.name: value
field.documentation: Value of the boundary condition. Unit depends on type, respectively [1-field, 2-field.m^-1, 3-m, 4-field.s^-1]. For type 1 to 4, only the first position in the vector is used. For type 5, all three positions are used, meaning respectively a1, a2, a3. Time-dependent. Array3D(3,nneut,max_ntype)

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of the boundary condition for the transport solver. 0- equation not solved; 1- value of the field y; 2-radial derivative of the field (-dy/drho_tor); 3-scale length of the field y/(-dy/drho_tor); 4- flux; 5- generic boundary condition y expressed as a1y'+a2y=a3. Time-dependent. Matrix(nneut,max_ntype)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Position of the boundary condition (in terms of toroidal flux coordinate) for the transport solver [m]. Outside this boundary, the value of the data are considered to be prescribed. Time-dependent. Matrix(nneut,max_ntype).

field.name: radial
field.documentation: Neutral velocity in the radial direction (perpendicular to the magnetic surface), positive is from the centre to the edge [m.s^-1]. Array3D(nrho,nneut,max_ntype). Time-dependent;

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Array3D(nrho,nneut,max_ntype)Time-dependent;

field.name: boundary
field.documentation: Boundary condition for the transport equation. Time-dependent.

field.name: value
field.documentation: Value of the boundary condition. Unit depends on type, respectively [1-field, 2-field.m^-1, 3-m, 4-field.s^-1]. For type 1 to 4, only the first position in the vector is used. For type 5, all three positions are used, meaning respectively a1, a2, a3. Time-dependent. Array3D(3,nneut,max_ntype)

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of the boundary condition for the transport solver. 0- equation not solved; 1- value of the field y; 2-radial derivative of the field (-dy/drho_tor); 3-scale length of the field y/(-dy/drho_tor); 4- flux; 5- generic boundary condition y expressed as a1y'+a2y=a3. Time-dependent. Matrix(nneut,max_ntype)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Position of the boundary condition (in terms of toroidal flux coordinate) for the transport solver [m]. Outside this boundary, the value of the data are considered to be prescribed. Time-dependent. Matrix(nneut,max_ntype).

field.name: prad0
field.documentation: Power radiated by neutrals [W.m^-3]. Matrix (nrho,nneut). Time-dependent.

field.name: coefficients
field.documentation: Recycling and sputtering coefficients used by the neutral solver. The nion index refers to the various ions (and charge states) considered in the simulation. The ion list is deduced from the composition%atomlist. Nion = sum(composition%atomlist%zn). Example, if D and C atoms are declared in the atomlist (in this order), nion would be equal to 7, representing D+,C+,C2+,C3+,C4+,C5+,C6+

field.name: recycling
field.documentation: Recycling coefficients

field.name: particles
field.documentation: Particle recycling coefficient corresponding to the conversion of ion type IION to the neutral type INEUT. Matrix(nneut,nion). Time-dependent.

field.name: energy
field.documentation: Energy recycling coefficient corresponding to the conversion of ion type IION to the neutral type INEUT. Matrix(nneut,nion). Time-dependent.

field.name: sputtering
field.documentation: Sputtering coefficients

field.name: physical
field.documentation: Effective coefficient of physical sputtering of the neutral type INEUT due to ion type IION. Matrix(nneut,nion). Time-dependent.

field.name: chemical
field.documentation: Effective coefficient of chemical sputtering of the neutral type INEUT due to ion type IION. Matrix(nneut,nion). Time-dependent.

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar

CPO.documentation: Impurity species (i.e. ion species with multiple charge states), radial core profiles. For heavy impurities, some ionisation states can be grouped into "bundles". Can be the result of an impurity transport code or experimental measurements. Time-dependent CPO

field.documentation: Generic information on a data item

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: rho_tor_norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal flux coordinate values (= rho_tor normalised to the value at the last grid point); Vector (nrho)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate (not normalised, equivalent to rho_tor_norm) [m]; Vector (nrho). Time-dependent.

field.name: source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the impurity profiles : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); Array of strings (nimp)

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Flag describing how the profile has been processed : 0-not calculated; 1-interpretative; 2-calculated by the transport solver; 3-calculated by a separate code : in that case only, description of the code provided in codeparam at the same level; 4-used value from the previous time step; Time-dependent; Vector(nimp)

field.name: desc_impur
field.documentation: Description of the impurities (list of ion species and possibly different charge states)

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass number of the impurity; Vector (nimp)

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge of the impurity; Vector (nimp)

field.name: i_ion
field.documentation: Index of the impurity species in the coreprof ion species ordering. Vector (nimp)

field.name: nzimp
field.documentation: Number of charge states (or bundles) considered for each impurity species. Vector (nimp)

field.name: zmin
field.documentation: Minimum Z of impurity ionisation state bundle. Matrix (nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: zmax
field.documentation: Maximum Z of impurity ionisation state bundle. If no bundle, zmax=zmin. Matrix (nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: z
field.documentation: Impurity ionisation state (averaged for bundle); Time-dependent; Array3D (nrho,nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: zsq
field.documentation: Z^2, Square of impurity ionisation state (averaged for bundle); Time-dependent; Array3D (nrho,nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: nz
field.documentation: Density of impurity in a given charge state [m^-3]. Time-dependent; Array3D (nrho,nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: source_term
field.documentation: Source term for each charge state. Time-dependent.

field.name: value
field.documentation: Value of the source term [m^-3.s^-1]; Time-dependent; Array3D (nrho,nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: integral
field.documentation: Integral from 0 to rho of the source term. Time-dependent; Array3D(nsource,nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the impurity profiles : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); Array of strings (nimp)

field.name: boundary
field.documentation: Boundary condition for each charge state. Time-dependent

field.name: value
field.documentation: Value of the boundary condition (in case flag = 2). Unit depends on type, respectively [1-field, 2-field.m^-1, 3-m, 4-field.s^-1]. For type 1 to 4, only the first position in the first dimension is used. For type 5, all three positions are used, meaning respectively a1, a2, a3. Time-dependent. Array 3D (3,nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: source
field.documentation: Source of the boundary condition (any comment describing its origin : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging); Array of strings (nimp)

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of the boundary condition for the transport solver (in case flag = 2). 0- equation not solved; 1- value of the field y; 2-radial derivative of the field (-dy/drho_tor); 3-scale length of the field y/(-dy/drho_tor); 4- flux; 5- generic boundary condition y expressed as a1y'+a2y=a3. Time-dependent. Matrix(nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: rho
field.documentation: Position of the boundary condition (in terms of toroidal flux coordinate) for the transport solver [m]. Outside this boundary, the value of the data are considered to be prescribed. Time-dependent. Matrix(nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: transp_coef
field.documentation: Transport coefficients for each charge state

field.name: diff
field.documentation: Diffusion coefficient [m^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent; Array3D(nrho,nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: vconv
field.documentation: Convection coefficient [m.s^-1]. Time-dependent; Array3D (nrho,nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the impurity profiles : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); Array of strings (nimp)

field.name: flux
field.documentation: Fluxes of impurity particles, two definitions [m^-2.s^-1]. Time-dependent.

field.name: flux_dv
field.documentation: Flux of the field calculated from the transport coefficients. Time-dependent; Array3D (nrho,nion,max_nzimp)

field.name: flux_interp
field.documentation: Interpretative flux deduced from measured data, the integral of the source term, and the time derivative of the field. Time-dependent; Array3D (nrho,nion,max_nzimp)

field.name: time_deriv
field.documentation: Integral of the time derivative term of the transport equation. Time-dependent. Array3D (nrho,nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: atomic_data
field.documentation: Reference for the atomic data used for each impurity. Array of strings (nimp)

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar.

CPO.documentation: Core plasma 1D profiles as a function of the toroidal flux coordinate, obtained by solving the core transport equations (can be also fitted profiles from experimental data). The codeparam element here describes the parameters of the transport equation solver and/or those of the fitting program. Time-dependent CPO.

field.name: drho_dt
field.documentation: Time derivative of rho_tor [m/s]; Vector (nrho). Time-dependent.

field.name: toroid_field
field.documentation: Toroidal field information entering the definition of rho_tor, for reference only. The physical value of the toroidal field should be taken from the toroidfield CPO. Time-dependent.

field.name: b0
field.documentation: Vacuum field at r0 [T]; Time-dependent. Scalar.

field.name: b0prime
field.documentation: Time derivative of the vacuum field at r0 [T/s]; Time-dependent. Scalar.

field.name: r0
field.documentation: Characteristic major radius of the device (used in publications, usually middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane) [m]. Scalar.

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s] (exact time slice used from the time array of the source signal, here the toroidfield CPO. If the time slice does not exist in the time array of the source signal, it means linear interpolation has been used); Time-dependent; Scalar.

field.name: composition
field.documentation: Plasma composition (description of ion species).

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass number (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: imp_flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in impurity CPO; Vector (nion)

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Poloidal magnetic flux [Wb]; Time-dependent;

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value [Wb]; Time-dependent; Vector (nrho)

field.name: derivative
field.documentation: Radial derivative (dvalue/drho_tor) [Wb.m^-1]; Time-dependent; Vector (nrho)

field.name: source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); String

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Flag describing how the profile has been processed : 0-not calculated; 1-interpretative; 2-calculated by the transport solver; 3-calculated by a separate code : in that case only, description of the code provided in codeparam at the same level; 4-used value from the previous time step; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: boundary
field.documentation: Boundary condition for the transport equation. Time-dependent.

field.name: value
field.documentation: Value of the boundary condition (in case flag = 2). Unit depends on type, respectively [1-Wb, 2-A, 3-V]. For type 1 to 3, only the first position in the vector is used. For type 5, all three positions are used, meaning respectively a1, a2, a3. Time-dependent. Vector(3).

field.name: source
field.documentation: Source of the boundary condition (any comment describing its origin : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging); String

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of the boundary condition for the transport solver (in case flag = 2). 0- equation not solved; 1- edge value of poloidal flux; 2- total current inside boundary; 3- edge Vloop; 4- not defined; 5- generic boundary condition expressed as a1*(dpsi_drho_tor)+a2*psi=a3. . Time-dependent.Scalar

field.name: rho
field.documentation: Position of the boundary condition (in terms of toroidal flux coordinate) for the transport solver [m]. Outside this boundary, the value of the data are considered to be prescribed. Scalar

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: jni
field.documentation: Non-inductive parallel current density [A/m^2]; Time-dependent;

field.name: value
field.documentation: Value of jni; Time-dependent; Vector (nrho)

field.name: integral
field.documentation: Integral from 0 to rho of jni. Time-dependent; Vector (nrho)

field.name: source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); String

field.name: sigma_par
field.documentation: Parallel conductivity [ohm^-1.m^-1]. Time-dependent

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector (nrho)

field.name: source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); String

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: te
field.documentation: Electron temperature [eV]; (source term in [W.m^-3]). Time-dependent;

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector (nrho)

field.name: derivative
field.documentation: Radial derivative (dvalue/drho_tor) [signal_value_unit.m^-1]; Time-dependent; Vector (nrho)

field.name: source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); String

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Flag describing how the profile has been processed : 0-not calculated 1-interpretative; 2-calculated by the transport solver; 3-calculated by a separate code : in that case only, description of the code provided in codeparam at the same level; 4-used value from the previous time step; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: boundary
field.documentation: Boundary condition for the transport equation. Time-dependent.

field.name: value
field.documentation: Value of the boundary condition (in case flag = 2). Unit depends on type, respectively [1-field, 2-field.m^-1, 3-m, 4-field.s^-1]. For type 1 to 4, only the first position in the vector is used. For type 5, all three positions are used, meaning respectively a1, a2, a3. Time-dependent. Vector(3).

field.name: source
field.documentation: Source of the boundary condition (any comment describing its origin : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging); String

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of the boundary condition for the transport solver (in case flag = 2). 0- equation not solved; 1- value of the field y; 2-radial derivative of the field (-dy/drho_tor); 3-scale length of the field y/(-dy/drho_tor); 4- flux; 5- generic boundary condition y expressed as a1y'+a2y=a3. Time-dependent. Scalar

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Position of the boundary condition (in terms of toroidal flux coordinate) for the transport solver [m]. Outside this boundary, the value of the data are considered to be prescribed. Time-dependent. Scalar

field.name: source_term
field.documentation: Total source term for the transport equation. Time-dependent.

field.name: value
field.documentation: Value of the source term; Time-dependent; Vector (nrho)

field.name: integral
field.documentation: Integral from 0 to rho of the source term. Time-dependent; Vector (nrho)

field.name: source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); String

field.name: transp_coef
field.documentation: Total transport coefficients. Time-dependent.

field.name: diff
field.documentation: Diffusion coefficient [m^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent; Vector (nrho)

field.name: vconv
field.documentation: Convection coefficient [m.s^-1]. Time-dependent; Vector (nrho)

field.name: source
field.documentation: Source of the profile (any comment describing the origin of the profile : code, path to diagnostic signals, massaging, ...); String

field.name: flux
field.documentation: Fluxes of the quantity, two definitions. Time-dependent.

field.name: flux_dv
field.documentation: Flux of the field calculated from the transport coefficients. Time-dependent; Vector (nrho)

field.name: flux_interp
field.documentation: Interpretative flux deduced from measured data, the integral of the source term, and the time derivative of the field. Time-dependent; Vector (nrho)

field.name: time_deriv
field.documentation: Integral of the time derivative term of the transport equation. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: beta_normal
field.documentation: normalised beta; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: beta_pol
field.documentation: poloidal beta; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: w_dia

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar

CPO.documentation: Generic source term for the core transport equations (radial profile). Time-dependent CPO.

field.name: datainfo
field.documentation: Generic information on a data item

field.name: dataprovider
field.documentation: Name of the actual data provider (the person who filled the data)

field.name: putdate
field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.name: whatref
field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: occurrence
field.documentation: Occurrence number of the CPO in the reference entry

field.name: putinfo
field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.name: putaccess
field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: putlocation
field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.name: rights
field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate (not normalised, equivalent to rho_tor_norm) [m]; Vector (nrho). Time-dependent.

field.name: rho_tor_norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal flux coordinate values (= rho_tor normalised to the value at the last grid point); Vector (nrho)

field.name: composition
field.documentation: Plasma composition (description of ion species).

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass number (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: imp_flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in impurity CPO; Vector (nion)

field.name: toroid_field
field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field, redundant with the toroidfield CPO, to document the normalisation of j in this CPO.

field.name: r0
field.documentation: Characteristic major radius of the device (used in publications, usually middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane) [m]. Scalar.

field.name: b0
field.documentation: Vacuum field at r0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. Scalar. Time-dependent.

field.name: j
field.documentation: Parallel current source for psi transport equation, = average(j.B) / B0, where B0 = coresource/toroid_field/b0 [A.m^-2]. Vector(nrho). Time-dependent.

field.name: sigma
field.documentation: Induced parallel conductivity [ohm^-1.m^-1]. EXACT DEFINITION PENDING. Vector(nrho). Time-dependent.

field.name: si
field.documentation: Particle source for ion density transport equation [m^-3.s^-1]. Time-dependent.

field.name: exp
field.documentation: Explicit source term [same unit as root quantity]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: imp
field.documentation: Implicit source term [s^-1.m^-3]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: se
field.documentation: Particle source for electron density transport equation [m^-3.s^-1]. Time-dependent.

field.name: exp
field.documentation: Explicit source term [same unit as root quantity]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: imp
field.documentation: Implicit source term [s^-1.m^-3]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: sz
field.documentation: Particle source for impurity density transport equation [m^-3.s^-1]. Time-dependent.

field.name: exp
field.documentation: Explicit source term [same unit as root quantity]. Time-dependent. Array3d (nrho,nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: imp
field.documentation: Implicit source term [s^-1.m^-3]. Time-dependent. Array3d (nrho,nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: qi
field.documentation: Heat source for ion heat transport equations [W.m^-3]. Time-dependent.

field.name: exp
field.documentation: Explicit source term [same unit as root quantity]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: imp
field.documentation: Implicit source term [s^-1.m^-3]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: qe
field.documentation: Heat source for electron heat transport equation [W.m^-3]. Time-dependent.

field.name: exp
field.documentation: Explicit source term [same unit as root quantity]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: imp
field.documentation: Implicit source term [s^-1.m^-3]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho)

field.name: qz
field.documentation: Heat source for impurity heat transport equations [W.m^-3]. Time-dependent.

field.name: exp
field.documentation: Explicit source term [same unit as root quantity]. Time-dependent. Array3d (nrho,nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: imp
field.documentation: Implicit source term [s^-1.m^-3]. Time-dependent. Array3d (nrho,nimp,max_nzimp)

field.name: ui
field.documentation: Velocity source for toroidal velocity transport equation [kg.m^-1.s^-2]. Vector(nrho). Time-dependent.

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass number (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: imp_flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in impurity CPO; Vector (nion)

field.name: rho_tor_norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal flux coordinate values (= rho_tor normalised to the value at the last grid point); Vector (nrho)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate (not normalised, equivalent to rho_tor_norm) [m]; Vector (nrho). Time-dependent.

field.name: sigma
field.documentation: Parallel conductivity [ohm^-1.m^-1]. Time-dependent. Vector(nrho).

field.name: ni_transp
field.documentation: Transport coefficients for ion density equation. Time-dependent.

field.name: diff_eff
field.documentation: Effective diffusivity [m^2.s^-1]. The last index of the array describes which multiplier should be applied to the particule flux when adding its contribution in the expression of the heat flux : position 1 is multiplied by 0, 2 is multiplied by 3/2, 3 is multiplied by 5/2. The total particle flux (for the particle transport equation) is obtained as the sum over the three positions. Time-dependent. Array3d (nrho,nion,3)

field.name: vconv_eff
field.documentation: Effective convection [m.s^-1]. The last index of the array describes which multiplier should be applied to the particule flux when adding its contribution in the expression of the heat flux : position 1 is multiplied by 0, 2 is multiplied by 3/2, 3 is multiplied by 5/2. The total particle flux (for the particle transport equation) is obtained as the sum over the three positions. Time-dependent. Array3d (nrho,nion,3)

field.name: flux
field.unit: field.m.s^-1,.m^-3 if field is not a density itself
field.documentation: Flux. Not used in transport equations [field.m.s^-1,.m^-3 if field is not a density itself]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: off_diagonal
field.documentation: Details of the transport matrix, just for diagnostic (not used in transport equations). Time-dependent.

field.name: d_ni
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling ion density gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Array3d (nrho,nion,nion)

field.name: d_ti
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling ion density gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Array3d (nrho,nion,nion)

field.name: d_ne
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling electron density gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: d_te
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling electron temperature gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: d_epar
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling parallel electric field to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: d_mtor
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling total toroidal momentum to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Flag describing the form of transport produced by the original model : 0- not calculated, 1- D and V, 2- flux, 3- full transport matrix. Scalar.

field.name: ne_transp
field.documentation: Transport coefficients for electron density equation. Time-dependent.

field.documentation: Effective diffusivity [m^2.s^-1]. The last index of the array describes which multiplier should be applied to the particule flux when adding its contribution in the expression of the heat flux : position 1 is multiplied by 0, 2 is multiplied by 3/2, 3 is multiplied by 5/2. The total particle flux (for the particle transport equation) is obtained as the sum over the three positions. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,3)

field.name: vconv_eff
field.documentation: Effective convection [m.s^-1]. The total particle flux (for the particle transport equation) is obtained as the sum over the three positions. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,3)

field.documentation: Effective diffusivity [m^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: vconv_eff
field.documentation: Effective convection [m.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: flux
field.unit: field.m.s^-1,.m^-3 if field is not a density itself
field.documentation: Flux. Not used in transport equations [field.m.s^-1,.m^-3 if field is not a density itself]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: off_diagonal
field.documentation: Details of the transport matrix, just for diagnostic (not used in transport equations). Time-dependent.

field.name: d_ni
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling ion density gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Array3d (nrho,nion,nion)

field.name: d_ti
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling ion density gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Array3d (nrho,nion,nion)

field.name: d_ne
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling electron density gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: d_te
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling electron temperature gradient to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: d_epar
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling parallel electric field to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: d_mtor
field.documentation: Off-Diagonal term coupling total toroidal momentum to the transport equation [m.^2.s^-1]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion)

field.name: flag
field.documentation: Flag describing the form of transport produced by the original model : 0- not calculated, 1- D and V, 2- flux, 3- full transport matrix. Scalar.

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar

CPO.documentation: Charge Exchange Diagnostic; Time-dependent CPO

field.name: datainfo
field.documentation: Generic information on a data item

field.name: dataprovider
field.documentation: Name of the actual data provider (the person who filled the data)

field.name: putdate
field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.name: whatref
field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: occurrence
field.documentation: Occurrence number of the CPO in the reference entry

field.name: putinfo
field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.name: putaccess
field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: putlocation
field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.name: rights
field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: setup
field.documentation: diagnostic setup information

field.name: position
field.documentation: Position of the measurement. Time-dependent. Vector (nchannels)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measured values

field.name: ti
field.documentation: Ion temperature [eV]. Vector (nchannels)

field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: vtor
field.documentation: Toroidal velocity [m/s]. Vector (nchannels)

field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.documentation: Poloidal velocity [m/s]. Vector (nchannels)

CPO.documentation: Distribution function for electron and ion species. Normally output from a Fokker-Planck calculation; Time-dependent CPO

field.documentation: Generic information on a data item
