field.name: orbitt_id
field.documentation: Parameters identifying an orbit

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass of the ion; Scalar

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Atomic charge of the ion; Scalar

field.name: energy
field.documentation: Energy of the ion [keV]; Time-dependent; Vector (norbits).

field.name: magn_mom
field.documentation: Magnetic momentum [kg m^2 / s^2 / T]; Time-dependent, Vector(norbits).

field.name: p_phi
field.documentation: toroidal angular momentum [kg m^2 / s]; Time-dependent; Vector(norbits);

field.name: sigma
field.documentation: Sign of parallel velocity at psi=psi_max along the orbit; Time-dependent; Vector(norbits)

field.name: orb_trace
field.documentation: Position of particle in 5D space (3D in real and 2D in velocity).

field.name: time_orb
field.documentation: Time along the orbit [s]; Time-dependent; Matrix (norbits, max_ntorb)

field.name: ntorb
field.documentation: Number of time slices along the orbit, for each orbit. Time-dependent; Vector (norbits)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius of the guiding centre [m], Major radius; Time-dependent; Matrix (norbits, max_ntorb).

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude of the guiding centre [m]; Time-dependent; Matrix (norbits, max_ntorb).

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Guiding centre position in psi [normalised poloidal flux]; Time-dependent; Matrix (norbits, max_ntorb)).

field.name: theta_b
field.documentation: Position of the guiding centre in poloidal Boozer angle [rad]; Time-dependent; Matrix (norbits, max_ntorb).

field.name: v_parallel
field.documentation: Parallel velocity along the orbit [m/s]; Time-dependent; Matrix (norbits, max_ntorb).

field.name: v_perp
field.documentation: Perpendicular velocity along the orbit [m/s]; Time-dependent; Matrix (norbits, max_ntorb).

field.name: orb_glob_dat
field.documentation: Global quantities associated with an orbit.

field.name: orbit_type
field.documentation: Identifier of orbit type: 0 trapped, -1 co-passing, + 1 counter-passing ; Time-dependent; Vector (norbits)

field.name: omega_b
field.documentation: Bounce angular frequency rad/s; Time-dependent; Vector (norbits)

field.name: omega_phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angular precession frequency [rad/s]; Time-dependent; Vector (norbits).

field.name: omega_c_av
field.documentation: Orbit averaged cyclotron frequency [rad/a]; Time-dependent; Vector(norbits).

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar

CPO.documentation: Description of the active poloidal coils, passive conductors, currents flowing in those and mutual electromagnetic effects of the device; Time-dependent CPO

field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: pfcoils
field.documentation: Active poloidal field coils

field.name: desc_pfcoils
field.documentation: Description of the coils

field.name: name
field.documentation: Name of coil. Array of strings (ncoils)

field.name: id
field.documentation: ID of coil. Array of strings (ncoils)

field.name: res
field.documentation: Coil resistance [Ohm]; Vector (ncoils)

field.name: emax
field.documentation: Maximum Energy to be dissipated in coils [J]; Vector (ncoils)

field.name: nelement
field.documentation: Number of elements used to describe a coil; Vector (ncoils)

field.name: pfelement
field.documentation: Axisymmetric conductor description

field.name: name
field.documentation: Name of this element. Should be a matrix of strings (ncoils,max_nelements), but not supported by the UAL yet.

field.name: id
field.documentation: ID of this element. Should be a matrix of strings (ncoils,max_nelements), but not supported by the UAL yet.

field.name: turnsign
field.documentation: Sign of turn and fraction of a turn for calculating magnetic field of the Element; Matrix (ncoils,max_nelements)

field.name: area
field.documentation: Surface area of this element [m^2]; Matrix (ncoils,max_nelements)

field.name: pfgeometry
field.documentation: Shape of a PF Coil Element

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type used to describe a coil shape (0 for 'rzcoordinates' or 1 for 'rzdrdz'); Matrix of integers (ncoils,max_nelements)

field.name: npoints
field.documentation: Number of points describing an element (irregular outline rzcoordinates); Matrix (ncoils,max_nelements)

field.name: rzcoordinate
field.documentation: Irregular outline [m]; 3D arrays (ncoils,max_nelements,max_npoints)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: rzdrdz
field.documentation: 4-vector defining Centre R,Z and full extents dR, dZ [m]; 3D Array (ncoils,max_nelements,4)

field.name: coilcurrent
field.documentation: Circuit feed current in the coil , defined positive if it flows from point 1 to point 2 of the component in the pfcircuit description [A]; Time-dependent; Vector (ncoils)

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: coilvoltage
field.documentation: Voltage on the full coil [V]; Time-dependent; Vector (ncoils)

field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: res

field.name: pfpageometry
field.documentation: Geometry of the passive elements

field.name: type

field.name: pfcircuits
field.documentation: Circuits, connected to multiple coils and to multiple supplies, defining the current and voltage relationships in the system

field.name: name
field.documentation: Name of circuit, array of strings (ncircuits)

field.name: id
field.documentation: ID of circuit, array of strings (ncircuits)

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of circuit, array of strings (ncircuits)

field.name: nnodes
field.documentation: Number of nodes used to describe a circuit. Vector (ncircuits)

field.name: connections
field.documentation: Description of the supplies and coils connections (nodes) across each circuit. Array 3D (ncircuits,max_nnodes,2*ncomponents), describing for each node which component are connected to it (1 if connected, 0 otherwise). There are 2 sides at each component, thus 2*ncomponents as the size of the third dimension, listing first all supplies, then all coils (in the same order as listed in PFSUPPLIES and PFCOILS). An example can be found in the data structure documentation PFconnections.pdf

field.name: pfsupplies
field.documentation: PF power supplies

field.name: desc_supply
field.documentation: Description of the power supplies

field.name: name
field.documentation: Name of the supply; Array of strings (nsupplies)

field.name: id
field.documentation: ID of the supply; Array of strings (nsupplies)

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type of supply; Array of strings (nsupplies)

field.name: delay
field.documentation: Pure delay in the supply [s]; Vector (nsupplies)

field.name: filter
field.documentation: Laplace proper filter

field.name: num
field.documentation: Coefficients of the numerator, in increasing order : a0 + a1*s + ... + an*s^n; Matrix (nsupplies,n)

field.name: den
field.documentation: Coefficients of the denominator, in increasing order : b0 + b1*s + ... + bm*s^m; Matrix (nsupplies,m)

field.name: imin
field.documentation: Minimum current [A]; Vector (nsupplies)

field.name: imax
field.documentation: Maximum current [A]; Vector (nsupplies)

field.name: res
field.documentation: Supply internal resistance [Ohm]; Vector (nsupplies)

field.name: umin
field.documentation: Minimum voltage [V]; Vector (nsupplies)

field.name: umax
field.documentation: Maximum voltage [V]; Vector (nsupplies)

field.name: emax
field.documentation: Maximum Energy to be dissipated in supply [J]; Vector (nsupplies)

field.name: voltage
field.documentation: Voltage at the supply output [V]; Time-dependent; Vector (nsupplies)

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: current
field.documentation: Current at the supply output, defined positive if it flows from point 1 to point 2 of the component in the pfcircuit description [A]; Time-dependent; Vector (nsupplies)

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: expression
field.documentation: Formal expression for the line integral to be evaluated as a function of ne, ni, Te, Ti, Zeff, Br, Bz

field.name: setup_line
field.documentation: Geometric description of the lines of sight

field.name: pivot_point
field.documentation: Pivot point of each line of sight; Vector (nchords)

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: horchordang1
field.documentation: Angle [rad] of horizontal projection of l.o.s. with poloidal cross section (0 for HFS to LFS chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]. Vector (nchords)

field.name: verchordang1
field.documentation: Angle of chord with vertical axis (0 for bottom-top chord, Pi for top-bottom chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: width
field.documentation: Width of the laser beam (1/e) [m]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: second_point
field.documentation: Second point defining the line of sight together with the pivot_point. In case the probing wave is reflected, this should be the position of the mirror. This data is redundant with horchordang1 and verchordang1. Vector (nchords).

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: horchordang2
field.documentation: For reflected l.o.s. only (undefined otherwise) : Angle [rad] of horizontal projection of reflected l.o.s. with poloidal cross section (0 for HFS to LFS chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]. Vector (nchords)

field.name: verchordang2
field.documentation: For reflected l.o.s. only (undefined otherwise) : Angle of reflected chord with vertical axis (0 for bottom-top chord, Pi for top-bottom chord - see Convention_angles_interfdiag.pdf) [rad]; Vector (nchords)

field.name: third_point
field.documentation: Third point defining the reflected line of sight together with the second_point (undefined if the probing wave is not reflected). This data is redundant with horchordang2 and verchordang2. Vector (nchords).

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius [m]

field.name: z
field.documentation: Altitude [m]

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle [rad]

field.name: nchordpoints
field.documentation: Number of points along the viewing chords (used for synthetic diagnostic signal reconstruction)

field.name: measure
field.documentation: Measured value. Time-dependent; Vector (nchords)

field.name: value
field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: abserror
field.documentation: Absolute error on signal; Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: relerror
field.documentation: Relative error on signal (normalised to signal value); Time-dependent; Vector

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar

field.name: datainfo
field.documentation: Generic information on a data item

field.name: dataprovider
field.documentation: Name of the actual data provider (the person who filled the data)

field.name: putdate
field.documentation: Date at which the data has been put in the DB

field.name: source
field.documentation: Exact reference of the data source (e.g. original reference in the native machine data base)

field.name: comment
field.documentation: Any additional comment

field.name: isref
field.documentation: 1 if the data can be found in the present data base entry; 2 if the data can be found in a parent data base entry; 0 if no data consistent with the present entry can be found.

field.name: whatref
field.documentation: Structure defining a database entry and the CPO occurrence

field.name: user
field.documentation: Name of the user if private data, public if public ITM database.

field.name: machine
field.documentation: Name of the device

field.name: shot
field.documentation: Shot number

field.name: run
field.documentation: Run number

field.name: occurrence
field.documentation: Occurrence number of the CPO in the reference entry

field.name: putinfo
field.documentation: Level 2 information describing how to retrieve the actual data for the UAL. Not to be filled/used by the ITM user !

field.name: putmethod
field.documentation: Storage method for this data

field.name: putaccess
field.documentation: Instructions to access the data using this method

field.name: putlocation
field.documentation: Name of this data under this method

field.name: rights
field.documentation: Access rights to this data

field.name: crash_trig
field.documentation: Flag indicating whether a crash condition has been satisfied : 0 = no crash. N(>0) = crash triggered due to condition ii=N. Integer. Time-dependent.

field.name: composition
field.documentation: Plasma composition (description of ion species).

field.name: amn
field.documentation: Atomic mass number (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: imp_flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in impurity CPO; Vector (nion)

field.name: rho_tor_norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal flux coordinate values (= rho_tor normalised to the value at the last grid point); Vector (nrho)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate [m] given by sqrt(phi/B0/pi), where B0 = toroidfield%bvac_r%value / toroidfield%r0. Vector (nrho). Time-dependent.

field.name: profiles1d
field.documentation: Core profiles after sawtooth crash

field.name: ne
field.documentation: Electron density [m^-3]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho).

field.name: ni
field.documentation: Ion density [m^-3]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion).

field.name: te
field.documentation: Electron temperature [eV]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho).

field.name: ti
field.documentation: Ion temperature [eV]. Time-dependent. Matrix (nrho,nion).

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Poloidal flux [Wb], without 1/2pi and such that Bp=|grad psi| /R/2/pi. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho).

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal flux [Wb]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho).

field.name: psistar
field.documentation: Psi* = psi - phi [Wb]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho).

field.name: volume
field.documentation: Volume enclosed in the flux surface [m^3]. Required to ensure particle and energy conservation during reconnection process (ndV and (nT)dV are conserved). Time-dependent. Vector (nrho).

field.name: q
field.documentation: Safety factor = dphi/dpsi [-]. Time-dependent. Vector (nrho).

field.name: shear1
field.documentation: Magnetic shear at q = 1 [-]. Time-dependent. Real scalar.

field.name: rhotorn_q1
field.documentation: Rho_tor_norm at q=1 radius [-]. Time-dependent. Real scalar.

field.name: rhotorn_inv
field.documentation: Rho_tor_norm at inversion radius [-]. Time-dependent. Real scalar.

field.name: rhotorn_mix
field.documentation: Rho_tor_norm at mixing radius [-]. Time-dependent. Real scalar.

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar

CPO.documentation: Scenario characteristics, to be used as input or output of a whole discharge simulator. Time-dependent CPO.

field.name: configs
field.documentation: Strings describing the tokamak configuration

field.name: config
field.documentation: plasma configuration (limiter/divertor ...) []. Time-dependent. Possible values : 0 = undetermined; 1 = poloidal limiter (ring); 2 = poloidal limiter (LFS); 3 = poloidal limiter (HFS); 4 = toroidal limiter (ring); 5 = toroidal limiter (segment); 6 = poloidal divertor; 7 = toroidal divertor (single null, ion drift in direction of divertor); 8 = toroidal divertor (single null, ion drift in oposite direction of divertor); 9 = toroidal divertor (double null).

field.documentation: Signal value; Time-dependent; Scalar Integer.

field.name: tor_rot_sc

field.documentation: Atomic mass number (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zn
field.documentation: Nuclear charge (lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: zion
field.documentation: Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed); Vector (nion)

field.name: imp_flag
field.documentation: Multiple charge state calculation flag : 0-Only one charge state is considered; 1-Multiple charge state are considered and are described in impurity CPO; Vector (nion)

field.name: global_param
field.documentation: Global wave deposition parameters

field.name: frequency
field.documentation: Wave frequency [Hz]; Time-dependent, floating

field.name: name
field.documentation: Antenna name, String

field.name: type
field.documentation: Wave type (LH, EC, IC, ...), String

field.name: ntor
field.documentation: Toroidal mode numbers; Time-dependent; Vector (ntor)

field.name: f_assumption
field.documentation: Assumption on the functions distribution used by the wave solver to calculate the power deposition : 0 = Maxwellian (linear absorption); 1 = quasi-linear (F given by a distribution function CPO). Integer vector (nion+1). The first value corresponds to the electrons, then to the other ion species. Time-dependent.

field.name: power_tot
field.documentation: Total absorbed wave power [W]; Time-dependent

field.name: p_frac_ntor
field.documentation: Fraction of wave power per toroidal mode number; Time-dependent; Vector (ntor)

field.name: pow_i
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by an ion species [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (nion)

field.name: pow_e
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by the electrons [W]; Time-dependent; Float

field.name: pow_ntor_i
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by an ion species per toroidal mode number [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ntor,nion)

field.name: pow_ntor_e
field.documentation: Wave power absorbed by the electrons per toroidal mode number [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (ntor)

field.name: cur_tor
field.documentation: Wave driven toroidal current from a stand alone calculation (not consistent with other sources) [A]; Time-dependent, Float

field.name: cur_tor_ntor
field.documentation: Wave driven toroidal current for each toroidal mode number from a stand alone calculation (not consistent with other sources) [A]; Time-dependent; Vector (ntor)

field.name: code_type
field.documentation: Type of wave deposition code for a given frequency: 1=beam/ray tracing; 2=full wave; Integer

field.name: toroid_field
field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field, redundant with the toroidfield CPO, to document the normalisation of parallel current densities in this CPO; Float.

field.name: r0
field.documentation: Characteristic major radius of the device (used in publications, usually middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane) [m]. Scalar.

field.name: b0
field.documentation: Vacuum field at r0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. Scalar. Time-dependent.

field.name: grid_1d
field.documentation: Grid points for 1D profiles.

field.name: rho_tor_norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal flux coordinate at the grid points for 1D profiles; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate at the grid points for 1D profiles [m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Grid points in poloidal flux function [Wb], without 1/2pi and such that Bp=|grad psi| /R/2/pi. Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: grid_2d
field.documentation: Grid points for 2D profiles and for full wave solutions.

field.name: grid_type
field.documentation: Grid type. 1: rectangular grid in (R,Z). 2: rectangular grid in (psi, theta). 3: unstructured grid. Integer.

field.name: rho_tor_norm
field.documentation: Normalised toroidal flux coordinate at the grid points for the 2D profiles; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: rho_tor
field.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate at the grid points for the 2D profiles [m]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Grid points in poloidal flux function [Wb], without 1/2pi and such that Bp=|grad psi| /R/2/pi. Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: theta
field.documentation: Poloidal angle at the grid points (see theta_info for detailed definition); Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: r
field.documentation: R (major radius) of grid points; Time-dependent; Matrix(ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: z
field.documentation: Z (altitude) of grid points; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: theta_info
field.documentation: Information on the poloidal angle theta.

field.name: angl_type
field.documentation: Type of poloidal angle: 1 : same as the poloidal angle in the equlibrium cpo; 2 : geometrical polar angle, tan(theta) = Z/(R-R_0); 3 : other. If option 3, a transformation to the geometrical poloidal angle is provided in th2th_pol.

field.name: th2th_pol
field.documentation: Geometrical poloidal angle at grid points in theta, i.e. the transformation from theta to the polar poloidal angle; used only if angl_type=3; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: profiles_1d
field.documentation: 1D radial profiles

field.name: powd_tot
field.documentation: Total flux surface averaged wave power density [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: powd_e
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged absorbed wave power density on electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: powd_i
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged absorbed wave power density on ion species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, nion)

field.name: powd_ntor
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged power density for each toroidal mode number [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix(npsi, ntor)

field.name: powd_ntor_e
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged absorbed power density for each toroidal mode number on electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: powd_ntor_i
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged power density for each toroidal mode number on each ions species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array3D (npsi, ntor, nion)

field.name: curd_tor
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged wave driven toroidal current density = average(jphi/R) / average(1/R) [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: curd_torntor
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged wave driven toroidal current density for each toroidal mode number = average(jphi/R) / average(1/R) [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: pow_tot
field.documentation: Volume integrated absorbed wave power density [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: pow_e
field.documentation: Volume integrated absorbed wave power density on electrons [W]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: pow_i
field.documentation: Volume integrated absorbed wave power density on ion species [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, nion)

field.name: pow_ntor
field.documentation: Volume integrated power density for each toroidal mode number [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: pow_ntor_e
field.documentation: Volume integrated power density for each toroidal mode number on the electrons [W]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: pow_ntor_i
field.documentation: Volume integrated power density for each toroidal mode number on each ions species [W]; Time-dependent; Array3D (npsi, ntor, nion)

field.name: curd_par
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged wave driven parallel current density = average(j.B) / B0, where B0 is in global_param/toroid_field/b0, from stand alone calculation (not consistent with other sources) ; [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: curd_parntor
field.documentation: Flux surface averaged wave driven parallel current density for each toroidal mode number = average(j.B) / B0, where B0 is in global_param/toroid_field/b0, from stand alone calculation (not consistent with other sources) ; [A/m^2]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: cur_tor
field.documentation: Wave driven toroidal current inside a flux surface from stand alone calculation (not consistent with other sources) [A]; Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)

field.name: cur_tor_ntor
field.documentation: Wave driven toroidal current inside a flux surface for each toroidal mode number from a stand alone calculation (not consistent with other sources) [A]; Time-dependent; Matrix (npsi, ntor)

field.name: profiles_2d
field.documentation: 2D profiles in poloidal cross-section

field.name: powd_tot
field.documentation: Total wave power density; Time-dependent [W/m^3]; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: powd_e
field.documentation: Absorbed wave power density on electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: powd_i
field.documentation: Absorbed wave power density on ion species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array3D (ndim1, ndim2, nion)

field.name: powd_ntor
field.documentation: Absorbed power density for each toroidal mode number [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor)

field.name: powd_ntor_e
field.documentation: Absorbed power density for each toroidal mode number on electrons [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor)

field.name: powd_ntor_i
field.documentation: Absorbed power density for each toroidal mode number on each ions species [W/m^3]; Time-dependent; Array4D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor, nion)

field.name: powd_iharm
field.documentation: Power density absorbed by an ion species for each toroidal mode numer at a given harmonic cyclotron resonance ; Time-dependent (W/m^3); Array5D (ndim1, ndim2, ntor, nion, nharm)

field.name: beamtracing
field.documentation: Beam-tracing or ray-tracing solver. Vector(nbeams). Time-dependent

field.name: npoints
field.documentation: Number of points along each ray/beam. Integer

field.name: power
field.documentation: Initial power in each ray/beam [W]. Float. Time-dependent

field.name: dnpar
field.documentation: Spectral width in refractive index associated with each ray/beam, Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: length
field.documentation: Ray/beam curvilinear length [m], Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: position
field.documentation: Ray/beam position

field.name: r
field.documentation: Major radius location [m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npoints)

field.name: z
field.documentation: Vertical location [m]; Time-dependent; Vector (npoints)

field.name: phi
field.documentation: Toroidal angle location [rad]; Time-dependent; Vector (npoints)

field.name: psi
field.documentation: Poloidal magnetic flux coordinate [Wb], without 1/2pi and such that Bp=|grad psi| /R/2/pi; Time-dependent; Vector (npoints)

field.name: theta
field.documentation: Poloidal angle location [rad]; Time-dependent; Vector (npoints). PRECISE THE DEFINITION OF THE POLOIDAL ANGLE, SEE WAVES/COHERENTWAVE(:)/GRID_2D.

field.name: wavevector
field.documentation: Ray/beam wave vector.

field.name: kr
field.documentation: Wave vector in the major radius direction [m**-1], Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: kz
field.documentation: Wave vector in the vertical direction [m**-1], Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: kphi
field.documentation: Wave vector in the toroidal direction [m**-1], Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: npar
field.documentation: Parallel refractive index, Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: nperp
field.documentation: Perpendicular refractive index, Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: ntor
field.documentation: Toroidal wave number, Vector (npoints/1). If var_ntor=0, ntor is constant along the ray path and the last dimension is of size 1 in order to avoid useless repetition of ntor constant value. Time-dependent

field.name: var_ntor
field.documentation: Flag telling whether ntor is constant along the ray path (0) or varying (1). Integer

field.name: polarization
field.documentation: Wave field polarization along the ray/beam.

field.name: epol_p_re
field.documentation: Real part of the left hand polarized electric field (rotating with the ions), Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: epol_p_im
field.documentation: Imaginary part of the left hand polarized electric field (rotating with the ions), Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: epol_m_re
field.documentation: Real part of the right hand polarized electric field (rotating with the electrons), Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: epol_m_im
field.documentation: Real part of the right hand polarized electric field (rotating with the electrons), Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: epol_par_re
field.documentation: Real part of the electric field polarization vector in the magnetic field direction, Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: epol_par_im
field.documentation: Imaginary part of the electric field polarization vector in the magnetic field direction, Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: powerflow
field.documentation: Power flow along the ray/beam.

field.name: phi_perp
field.documentation: Normalized power flow in the direction perpendicular to the magnetic field; Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: phi_par
field.documentation: Normalized power flow in the direction parallel to the magnetic field; Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: power_e
field.documentation: Power absorbed along the beam by electrons [W]; Vector (npoints). Time-dependent

field.name: power_i
field.documentation: Power absorbed along the beam by an ion species [W]; Matrix (npoints, nion). Time-dependent

field.name: fullwave
field.documentation: Solution by full wave code

field.name: pol_decomp
field.documentation: Poloidal decomposition of the wave fields. Uses the flux surface grid in grid_1d.

field.name: mpol
field.documentation: Poloidal mode numbers; Vector (nmpol)

field.name: e_plus
field.documentation: Magnitude of poloidal Fourier decomposition of left hand polarised component of the wave electric field [V/m]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: e_plus_ph
field.documentation: Phase of poloidal Fourier decomposition of left hand polarised component of the wave electric field [rad]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: e_minus
field.documentation: Magnitude of poloidal Fourier decomposition of right hand polarised component of the wave electric field; Time-dependent (V/m); Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: e_minus_ph
field.documentation: Phase of poloidal Fourier decomposition of right hand polarised component of the wave electric field [rad]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: e_norm
field.documentation: Magnitude of poloidal Fourier decomposition of wave electric field normal to a flux surface [V/m]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: e_norm_ph
field.documentation: Phase of poloidal Fourier decomposition of wave electric field normal to a flux surface [rad]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: e_binorm
field.documentation: Magnitude of poloidal Fourier decomposition of wave electric field tangent to a flux surface [V/m]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: e_binorm_ph
field.documentation: Phase of poloidal Fourier decomposition of wave electric field tangent to a flux surface [rad]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: e_para
field.documentation: Magnitude of poloidal Fourier decomposition of parallel wave electric field [V/m]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: e_para_ph
field.documentation: Phase of poloidal Fourier decomposition of parallel wave electric field [rad]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: b_norm
field.documentation: Magnitude of poloidal Fourier decomposition of wave magnetic field normal to a flux surface [T]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: b_norm_ph
field.documentation: Phase of poloidal Fourier decomposition of parallel wave electric field [rad]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: b_binorm
field.documentation: Magnitude of poloidal Fourier decomposition of wave magnetic field tangent to a flux surface [T]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: b_binorm_ph
field.documentation: Phase of poloidal Fourier decomposition of wave magnetic field tangent to a flux surface [rad]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: b_para
field.documentation: Magnitude of Fourier decomposition of wave magnetic field parallel to the equilibrium magnetic field [T]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: b_para_ph
field.documentation: Phase of Fourier decomposition of wave magnetic field parallel to the equilibrium magnetic field [T]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, npsi, nmpol)

field.name: local
field.documentation: Local description of the wave fields. Uses the grid in grid_2d.

field.name: e_plus
field.documentation: Magnitude of left hand polarised component of the wave electric field [V/m]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: e_plus_ph
field.documentation: Phase of left hand polarised component of the wave electric field [rad]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: e_minus
field.documentation: Magnitude of right hand polarised component of the wave electric field [v/m]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: e_minus_ph
field.documentation: Phase of right hand polarised component of the wave electric field [rad]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: e_norm
field.documentation: Magnitude of wave electric field normal to a flux surface [V/m]; Time-dependent; 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: enorm_ph
field.documentation: Phase of wave electric field normal to a flux surface [rad]; Time-dependent; 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: e_binorm
field.documentation: Magnitude of wave electric field tangent to a flux surface [V/m]; Time-dependent; 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: e_binorm_ph
field.documentation: Phase of wave electric field tangent to a flux surface [rad]; Time-dependent; 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: e_para
field.documentation: Magnitude of parallel wave electric field [V/m]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: e_para_ph
field.documentation: Phase of parallel wave electric field [rad]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: b_norm
field.documentation: Magnitude of wave magnetic field normal to a flux surface [T]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: b_norm_ph
field.documentation: Phase of wave magnetic field normal to a flux surface [rad]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: b_binorm
field.documentation: Magnitude of wave magnetic field tangent to a flux surface [T]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: b_binorm_ph
field.documentation: Phase of wave magnetic field tangent to a flux surface [rad]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: b_para
field.documentation: Magnitude of wave magnetic field parallel to the equilibrium magnetic field [T]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: b_para_ph
field.documentation: Phase of wave magnetic field parallel to the equilibrium magnetic field [rad]; Time-dependent; Array 3D (ntor, ndim1, ndim2)

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: codeparam
field.documentation: Code parameters

field.name: codename
field.documentation: Name of the code

field.name: codeversion
field.documentation: Version of the code (as in the ITM repository)

field.name: parameters
field.documentation: List of the code specific parameters, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_diag
field.documentation: List of the code specific diagnostic/output, string expected to be in XML format.

field.name: output_flag
field.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values meaning some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used. Exact rules could discussed and implemented in the module wrapper. Time-dependent.

field.name: time
field.documentation: Time [s]; Time-dependent; Scalar
